statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT timestamp, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE receiver_address = 'Bob' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice'
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE receiver_address = 'Bob' AND amount <= 50
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND receiver_address = 'Bob';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND amount < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT receiver_address, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY receiver_address HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 2 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_number, COUNT(*) FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, account_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'transfer' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.from_address, t.to_address, a.account_balance FROM blockchain_transactions t INNER JOIN user_accounts a ON t.from_address = a.account_name WHERE a.account_balance < 100000 ORDER BY a.account_balance ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_hash, t.amount, l.action FROM blockchain_transactions t INNER JOIN audit_log l ON t.transaction_id = l.transaction_id WHERE l.user_id = 123 ORDER BY t.amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_hash, t.timestamp, a.account_name FROM blockchain_transactions t INNER JOIN user_accounts a ON t.from_address = a.account_name ORDER BY t.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_blocks ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE miner_address='0xABCDEF' AND block_number < 1000;
SELECT address, owner_name, created_timestamp FROM blockchain_addresses WHERE owner_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY created_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT block_id, transaction_hash, sender_address, recipient_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT miner_name, mining_power FROM blockchain_miners ORDER BY mining_power DESC;
SELECT address, balance FROM blockchain_addresses WHERE balance < 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x4a1bF2b2c7E2546fe617eDCdh2DAa' AND recipient_address = '0x7cB314a1e4975138C61a6bbAa7d24';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, recipient_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, miner_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT address_id, address, balance, last_transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_addresses WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT miner_name, mining_power, mining_reward FROM blockchain_miners WHERE mining_power > 100 ORDER BY mining_power DESC;
